attributes.value: Does not respect the law
Values family
Finds blind honesty foolish
Sees guile and cunning as indirect and somewhat worthless
Values independence
Sees competition as reasonably important
Sees perseverance in the face of adversity as bull-headed and foolish
Is quick to form negative views about things
Often feels envious of others
Is dour as a rule
Is stingy with resources on projects and refuses to expend any extra effort
Feels best when everyone gets along without any strife or contention
Presents herself modestly and frowns on any flashy accoutrements
Is not a private person and freely shares details of her life
Is frustratingly sloppy and careless with every task she sets to carry out
Hates vows, obligations, promises and other binding elements that could restrict her
Tries to keep her things orderly
Is very trusting
Only rarely tries to assert herself in conversation
Seeks out exciting and adventurous situations
Meager creativity
Good intuition
A good memory
